verses.verse: "Now it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8104>being<s%> <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>set<s%> you <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1293>blessings<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon you and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you, <S%H3588>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> [shall] you [be] in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> [shall] you [be] in the <S%H7704>country.<s%>

<S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> [shall be] the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%> and the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%> and the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H929>beasts,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>herd<s%> and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
<S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> [shall be] your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your <S%H4863>kneading<s%> <S%H4863>bowl.<s%>
<S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> [shall] you [be] when you <S%H935>come<s%> in, and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> [shall] you [be] when you <S%H3318>go<s%> out.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>cause<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> who <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> you to be <S%H5062>defeated<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; they shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H413>against<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> and shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon you in your <S%H618>barns<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H9303>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to, and He will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6965>establish<s%> you as a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to Himself, as He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you, <S%H3588>if<s%> you will <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> in His <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

"So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> that you are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of you.

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will make you <S%H3498>abound<s%> in <S%H9186>prosperity,<s%> in the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%> and in the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H929>beast<s%> and in the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> you.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6605>open<s%> for you His <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H214>storehouse,<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> to your <S%H776>land<s%> in its <S%H6256>season<s%> and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H9233>lend<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> but you shall not <S%H9233>borrow.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> you the <S%H7218>head<s%> and not the <S%H2180>tail,<s%> and you <S%H7534>only<s%> shall be <S%H4605>above,<s%> and you shall not be <S%H4295>underneath,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> you will <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>charge<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> [them] <S%H6213>carefully,<s%>

and do not <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them.

"But it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about, <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>charge<s%> you <S%H3117>today,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon you and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you.
<S%H779>"Cursed<s%> [shall] you [be] in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H779>cursed<s%> [shall] you [be] in the <S%H7704>country.<s%>
<S%H779>"Cursed<s%> [shall be] your <S%H2935>basket<s%> and your <S%H4863>kneading<s%> <S%H4863>bowl.<s%>

<S%H779>"Cursed<s%> [shall be] the <S%H6529>offspring<s%> of your <S%H990>body<s%> and the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of your <S%H127>ground,<s%> the <S%H7698>increase<s%> of your <S%H504>herd<s%> and the <S%H6251>young<s%> of your <S%H6629>flock.<s%>
<S%H779>"Cursed<s%> [shall] you [be] when you <S%H935>come<s%> in, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> [shall] you [be] when you <S%H3318>go<s%> out.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7971>send<s%> upon you <S%H3994>curses,<s%> <S%H4103>confusion,<s%> and <S%H4045>rebuke,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H3027>undertake<s%> <S%H9303><s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> and <S%H5704>until<s%> you perish <S%H6>quickly,<s%> on <S%H4118>account<s%> <S%H4480><s%> of the <S%H6440>evil<s%> of your <S%H7455>deeds,<s%> <S%H4611>because<s%> you have <S%H834>forsaken<s%> Me.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will make the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H1692>cling<s%> to you <S%H5704>until<s%> He has <S%H3615>consumed<s%> you from the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with <S%H7829>consumption<s%> and with <S%H6920>fever<s%> and with <S%H1816>inflammation<s%> and with <S%H2746>fiery<s%> <S%H2746>heat<s%> and with the <S%H2719>sword<s%> and with <S%H9584>blight<s%> and with <S%H3420>mildew,<s%> and they shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you <S%H5704>until<s%> you perish.

"And the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H7218>head<s%> shall be <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> you, <S%H1270>iron.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H80>powder<s%> and <S%H6083>dust;<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> it shall <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on you <S%H5704>until<s%> you are <S%H8045>destroyed.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>cause<s%> you to be <S%H5062>defeated<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H340>enemies;<s%> you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> them, but you shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and you shall be [an example of] <S%H2113>terror<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And your <S%H5038>carcasses<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> shall be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H2729>frighten<s%> [them] <S%H2729>away.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with the <S%H7822>boils<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and with <S%H9425>tumors<s%> and with the <S%H1618>scab<s%> and with the <S%H9174>itch,<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H7495>healed.<s%>
"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with <S%H7697>madness<s%> and with <S%H5788>blindness<s%> and with <S%H8541>bewilderment<s%> of <S%H3824>heart;<s%>

and you shall <S%H4959>grope<s%> at <S%H6672>noon,<s%> as the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5787>man<s%> <S%H4959>gropes<s%> in <S%H653>darkness,<s%> and you shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in your <S%H1870>ways;<s%> but you shall <S%H389>only<s%> be <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H1497>robbed<s%> <S%H3605>continually,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> with <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> you.

"You shall <S%H781>betroth<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> but <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7693>violate<s%> her; you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> but you shall not <S%H3427>live<s%> in it; you shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> but you shall not <S%H2490>use<s%> its <S%H2490>fruit.<s%>

"Your <S%H7794>ox<s%> shall be <S%H2873>slaughtered<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of it; your <S%H2543>donkey<s%> shall be <S%H1497>torn<s%> <S%H1497>away<s%> from you, and shall not be <S%H7725>restored<s%> to you; your <S%H6629>sheep<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and you shall <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> you.

"Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> while your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> on and <S%H3616>yearn<s%> for them <S%H3605>continually<s%><S%H3117>;<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> shall be <S%H369>nothing<s%> you can <S%H3027>do.<s%>

"A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you do not <S%H3045>know<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> up the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3018>labors,<s%> and you shall <S%H7534>never<s%> be <S%H7534>anything<s%> but <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> and <S%H7533>crushed<s%> <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
"And you shall be <S%H7696>driven<s%> <S%H7696>mad<s%> by the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of <S%H834>what<s%> you <S%H7200>see.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5221>strike<s%> you on the <S%H1290>knees<s%> and <S%H7785>legs<s%> with <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H7822>boils,<s%> from <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H7495>healed,<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> to the <S%H6936>crown<s%> of your <S%H6936>head.<s%>

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1980>bring<s%> you and your <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you shall <S%H6965>set<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> you <S%H3808>nor<s%> your fathers have <S%H1>known,<s%> and <S%H3045>there<s%> you shall <S%H8033>serve<s%> <S%H5647>other<s%> <S%H312>gods,<s%> <S%H430>wood<s%> and <S%H6086>stone.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>horror,<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and a <S%H8148>taunt<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5090>drive<s%> you.

"You shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> out <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H7704>field<s%> but you shall <S%H622>gather<s%> in <S%H4592>little,<s%> for the <S%H697>locust<s%> shall <S%H2628>consume<s%> it.

"You shall <S%H5193>plant<s%> and <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> but you shall <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H103>gather<s%> [the grapes,] for the <S%H9641>worm<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.

"You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H2132>trees<s%> <S%H3605>throughout<s%> your <S%H1366>territory<s%> but you shall not <S%H5480>anoint<s%> yourself with the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> for your <S%H2132>olives<s%> shall <S%H5394>drop<s%> <S%H5394>off.<s%>
"You shall <S%H3205>have<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> but they shall not be yours, for they shall <S%H1980>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>
"The <S%H9488>cricket<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6086>trees<s%> and the <S%H6529>produce<s%> of your <S%H127>ground.<s%>

"The <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you shall <S%H5927>rise<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> you <S%H4605>higher<s%> and <S%H4605>higher,<s%> but you shall <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4295>lower<s%> and <S%H4295>lower.<s%>
"He shall <S%H9233>lend<s%> to you, but you shall not <S%H9233>lend<s%> to him; he shall be the <S%H7218>head,<s%> and you shall be the <S%H2180>tail.<s%>

"So <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7045>curses<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you and <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> you <S%H5704>until<s%> you are <S%H8045>destroyed,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you would not <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H6963><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> by <S%H8104>keeping<s%> His <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and His <S%H2708>statutes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.
"And they shall <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> and a <S%H4159>wonder<s%> on you and your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

<S%H8478>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you did not <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%> and a <S%H2898>glad<s%> <S%H3824>heart,<s%> for the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things;<s%>

therefore you shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> against you, in <S%H7458>hunger,<s%> in <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> in <S%H5903>nakedness,<s%> and in the <S%H2640>lack<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things;<s%> and He will <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%> on your <S%H6677>neck<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> He has <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you.

"The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5375>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H1675>swoops<s%> <S%H1675>down,<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3956>language<s%> you shall not <S%H8085>understand,<s%>

a <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H5794>fierce<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> shall <S%H5375>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6440>respect<s%> for the <S%H2205>old,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2603>show<s%> <S%H2603>favor<s%> to the <S%H5288>young.<s%>
